metadata.title: After wearables, docs predict AI-controlled implants to be next big thing | Hyderabad News - The Times of India
metadata.description: Hyderabad: While smartwatches and wearable devices have become common, doctors say the next step could be AI-controlled chips implanted inside the hum.
metadata.keywords: Hyderabad news, Hyderabad latest news, Hyderabad news live, Hyderabad news today, Today news Hyderabad,AI-controlled implants,AI in healthcare,living intelligence,patient safety AI,ethical AI in medicine
